Reviews.Title: delayed
Reviews.Author: tam-tam
Reviews.Content: its a very cute camera , and the picture quality and features are nice, the only trouble i had was that when i there are alot of pictures , the camera got slow and froze up a few times, so i always have to now make sure that i back up my pictures and clear the memory of the card.

Reviews.Title: Love the M5370 camera
Reviews.Author: dparson
Reviews.Content: The camera is  easy to use and takes great pics. Lots of control for a photographer who likes to play with settings, but simple aim and shoot for amateurs who choose that

Reviews.Title: kodack touch screen
Reviews.Author: Pamela L. Smith
Reviews.Content: I was really suprised by how well this camera works especially  the zoom features and battery life.pros:.generally excellent clarity and HD photo quality. amazing zoom. I could clearly read small words  from yards away.. I loved the  compact size and colors though they look different in person then on the computer.affordable and dependablecons:. zooming in on the video is bad, spotty, quality. randomly the photos would become blurry and it lost its stabilization. the camera would take a while to process photos sometimesover all I would get this camera again because its worth the money and has a great touch screen

Reviews.Title: product is ok but the seller is amazing.
Reviews.Author: Rabiatul Adawiyyah
Reviews.Content: Very fast shipping and the seller gave a direct call to help fix the product when I wanted to return it after a few times of freezing occurring from the camera.It had glitches but after using it for almost a year, I got compliments on the beautiful and cool color of the camera and i am still using it for my graduation pictures.Works good for me. But i use blur reduction mode a lot. So it's not perfect.

ProductInfo.Features:
16Mp Resolution
3.0" Touch Screen LCD Display
SCHNEIDER-KREUZNACH VARIOGON Lens
28-140mm Equivalent Focal Length
5x Optical Zoom
1600 ISO
720p HD Video Capture
Kodak's Share Button
Smart Capture Technology
Creative and Scene Modes
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare Touch M5370 16 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom, HD Video Capture and 3.0-Inch Capacitive Touchscreen LCD (Purple)
